name: UpdateApplicationHistory
description:
Update the history of an application.

This tool updates the history of an application, such as setting the entered stage time or deleting a history event. It requires the 'candidatesWrite' permission and the appropriate settings in your admin API key permissions configuration.

parameters.name: application_history_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details of the history update, such as the entered stage time or event to be deleted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
